lead_paragraph: The 18-year-old fatally shot by a suburban St. Louis police officer didn't face any juvenile charges at the time of his death and never was convicted of a serious felony such as murder, robbery or burglary, a juvenile court system lawyer said Wednesday.

headline.main: Lawyer: Brown Never Convicted of Serious Felony
headline.print_headline: Lawyer: Brown Never Convicted of Serious Felony
